column6: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69654#69662#TD4095E.TXT.r_1289;TD4095E.TXT.r_1290;TD4095E.TXT.r_1291;TD4095E.TXT.r_1292# brtson 'grus ni dge ba la sems mngon par spro ba'o // / +'di dag ni dge ba'i sems thams cad la 'byung ba'o // /

column3: bden pa gang zhig mngon bar rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no // /

column3: de'i rnam pa can yin no // / +zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid  yin no zhes bshad pa yin no // /
de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69682#69692#TD4095E.TXT.r_1296;TD4095E.TXT.r_1297;TD4095E.TXT.r_1298;TD4095E.TXT.r_1299;TD4095E.TXT.r_1300# le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi mi mthun ba'i phyogs so // / +ma dad pa ni dad pa'i mi mthun pa'o // /

column3: 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir / / +'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin  yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69693#69703#TD4095E.TXT.r_1299;TD4095E.TXT.r_1300;TD4095E.TXT.r_1301;TD4095E.TXT.r_1302;TD4095E.TXT.r_1303# rgod pa ni sems rnam  par ma zhi ba ste / / +'di dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi sems thams cad la 'byung ngo // /

column3: chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug / / +'thob ces bya bar sbyar te / /

column3: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las shes pa gnyis da ltar byung ba yin la / /

column7: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69712#69721#TD4095E.TXT.r_1303;TD4095E.TXT.r_1304;TD4095E.TXT.r_1305;TD4095E.TXT.r_1306;TD4095E.TXT.r_1307# de dag gi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do // / +khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin dang gyo dang ni // / +phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang / /
column8: 0.011#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1441349#1441353#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4829;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4830# khro ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems la yang zhes bya ba ni khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin dang gyo dang ni // / +phrag dog tshig 'chab ser sna dang  sgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni // /
column9: 0.013#TD4059E.TXT.r#413287#413288#TD4059E.TXT.r_70# reg pa dang  yid la byed pa dang  tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  sems  pa dang  'dun pa dang  mos pa dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab dang  dad pa dang  ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang  ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  brtson  'grus dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  bag yod pa dang  btang snyoms dang  rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang  'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  nga rgyal dang  ma rig pa dang  lta ba dang  the tshom dang  kho ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'chab ba dang  'tshig  pa dang  phrag dog dang  ser sna dang  sgyu dang  gyo dang  rgyags pa dang  rnam par 'tshe ba dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  rmugs pa dang  rgod pa dang  ma dad pa dang  le lo dang  bag med pa dang  brjed ngas pa dang  rnam par gyengs pa dang   shes bzhin ma yin pa dang  'gyod pa dang  gnyid dang  rtog pa dang  dpyod pa'o / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa drug 'thob ste / / +chos shes pa dang  rjes su shes pa dang  sdug bsngal    dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang  lam shes pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1608934#1608939#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2476;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2477# 'di dag la nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa yod pas 'di ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa pa rnams te / / +ma rig pa tsam dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dang  yid kyi sa pa kho na dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69720#69732#TD4095E.TXT.r_1305;TD4095E.TXT.r_1306;TD4095E.TXT.r_1307;TD4095E.TXT.r_1308# phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang / / +sgyu dang rgyags  dang rnam 'tshe ni // / +nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams / /

column3: 'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun // / +'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69730#69742#TD4095E.TXT.r_1308;TD4095E.TXT.r_1309;TD4095E.TXT.r_1310# 'di dag ni ma rig pa tsam dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang  yid kyi sa pa kho na dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa par brjod do // /
column5: 0.015#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2646309#2646310#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13740;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13741# de bzhin du gang zag sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i khongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yang ma yin te / / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal dang kun  'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs so // /
column6: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2016596#2016596#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5626;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5627# mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos shes pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +'dir mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa la ltos nas dang po nyid du mngon par 'dod do // /
column7: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#795503#795504#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4817# bden pa dag la sogs par mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2004777#2004778#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3918# rnam par smin pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin  pas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa mi dge ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no // /
column9: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#676938#676939#TD4069E.TXT.r_7578;TD4069E.TXT.r_7579;TD4069E.TXT.r_7580# de rnams kyi dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i yin te / / +de ni zad par dga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni mngon par  rtogs pa'i bgegs yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2566069#2566069#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3789# lam gyis 'dag par 'gyur ba de bor nas gzhan tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyis 'dag 'dag par yid ches pas log par zhugs pa'i phyir lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no // /
column11: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1862061#1862062#TD4039E.TXT.r_5438# mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang  gong du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa de rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir log par lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i lam ma yin pa la yang lam ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du  rab tu shes so // /
column12: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2029443#2029444#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7449# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spang ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba  rnams spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gsum dang  gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa ste lnga yin no // /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241063#241063#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3486# 'dod chags la sogs pa bsgom  pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni lpags shun la sogs pa lta bu'o // /
column14: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1881080#1881080#TD4039E.TXT.r_7758# byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag kyang mu stegs can gzhan rnams la zhe sdang  gi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang  dgra zla'i tshul gyis mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mi ldan pa'i phyir na kho na med pa dang  'gran zla can ma yin pa dang  gnod sems can ma yin pa zhes bya'o //// /
column15: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2088085#2088086#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15970;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15971# zag ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i khongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma yin te / / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin na / /
column16: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#795115#795115#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4747;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4748# mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga po dag ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin du zin yang kha phyir  bltas par 'jug pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyid do // / +mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni kha nang du bltas pas 'jug ste / /

column3: de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi // / +bsgom ba'i lam la bdun 'thob po // / +skad cig ma bcu  drug gi gong ma'i bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bam yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang  bar chad med pa dang  rnam par grol ba dang  khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4089E.TXT.r#562455#562459#TD4089E.TXT.r_313;TD4089E.TXT.r_314;TD4089E.TXT.r_315;TD4089E.TXT.r_316# nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams // / +'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni // / +rtog  dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1608972#1608972#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2481;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2482# de la sems gang zhig la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za par 'byung ba brjod par bya ste / / +re zhig  'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1474049#1474053#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8655;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8656;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8657;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8658# dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dag dang zhes bya ba ni / / +'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la  ni // / +rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir // /
column7: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69743#69751#TD4095E.TXT.r_1309;TD4095E.TXT.r_1310;TD4095E.TXT.r_1311# 'di dag gi rgyas par bshad pa ni phyis 'chad do // / +sems gang zhig  la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za bar 'byung ba brjod par bya ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69751#69759#TD4095E.TXT.r_1310;TD4095E.TXT.r_1311;TD4095E.TXT.r_1312;TD4095E.TXT.r_1313;TD4095E.TXT.r_1314# sems gang zhig  la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za bar 'byung ba brjod par bya ste / / +re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste dge ba la sogs pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#69759#69769#TD4095E.TXT.r_1311;TD4095E.TXT.r_1313;TD4095E.TXT.r_1314;TD4095E.TXT.r_1312;TD4095E.TXT.r_1315;TD4095E.TXT.r_1316;TD4095E.TXT.r_1317# re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste dge ba la sogs pa'o // / +'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni // / +rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir // /
column10: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1609004#1609004#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2487;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2488;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2489# 'dod pa'i dge pa'i sems la ni // / +rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir // / +sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis // /
column11: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#702993#702993#TD4091E.TXT.r_1532;TD4091E.TXT.r_1533# nges par sa mang po pa bcu dang  dge ba'i sa mang po pa bcu dang  rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis te / / +sems las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung ngo // /

column18: 0.018#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542899#1542900#TD4061E.TXT.r_4112# de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /

column22: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103105#3103107#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1674# mngon par dga' ba rnam pa bdun po slong MO PA MA 'ONGS PA NAS sems mngon par dga' ba dang  slong mo 'ongs pa na mthong ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' ba dang  sbyin pa sbyin par  byed pa na yid bde ba'i sems dang  mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang  ngoms mi shes pa'i sems dang  rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa med pa'i sems dang  byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis / /

column25: 0.024#TD4080E.TXT.r#1117#1117#TD4080E.TXT.r_116# sems can de rnams  kun la mnyam pa'i sems dang  phan pa'i sems dang  gnod sems med pa'i sems dang  byams pa'i sems dang  mi smod pa'i sems dang  pha dang ma'i sems dang  bu dang bu mo'i sems dang  mdza' bshes kyi sems dang   snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems su bya ba ste / /

column6: 1.192#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1466253#1466255#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7734# mtshungs pa lngas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mtshungs pa lnga po rten dang dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa dag gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column7: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2063369#2063369#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12350# rten dang dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa dag gis mtshungs par ldan pas na mtshungs par ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa yin no // /

column9: 1.192#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1444135#1444139#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5166# de nyid kyi phyir 'du byed 'di dag ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang ma yin pas sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag ces bya'o zhes bya ba smos so // /

column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#703752#703752#TD4091E.TXT.r_1677;TD4091E.TXT.r_1678# 'das pa'i chos rnams la  'das pa'i thob pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i thob pa yang yod la / / +de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang so sor rnam pa gsum mo // /

column3: gnyen po dang ni thag bsring ba'i // / +'thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin // / +rnyed pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dag ni dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyi yin te / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go // / +da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o // / +gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#70341#70348#TD4095E.TXT.r_1436;TD4095E.TXT.r_1437;TD4095E.TXT.r_1438# der gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa // / +'dod pa dang  gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa kho na'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1610798#1610800#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2805;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2806# chos gang dag khams gang du  gtogs pa de dag gi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa yin te / / +'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no // /
column6: 0.021#TD4091E.TXT.r#703785#703785#TD4091E.TXT.r_1682# chos gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i khams gang du gtogs pa de dag gi thob pa ni go rims bzhin du 'dod pa dang     gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa na / /

column3: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin te / / +de ltar  na dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni 'thob pa bzhi yin no // / +zag pa med pa rnams dang  nyon mongs pa thams cad dang  lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi ni gnyis yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#70349#70359#TD4095E.TXT.r_1437;TD4095E.TXT.r_1438;TD4095E.TXT.r_1439;TD4095E.TXT.r_1440;TD4095E.TXT.r_1441;TD4095E.TXT.r_1442# 'dod pa dang  gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa kho na'o // / +ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi // / +zag PA MED PA RNAMS KYI thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi  ste ; /
column5: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1446928#1446928#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5533;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5534# gal te de lta yin par gyur na ni lam gyi so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i thob pa zag pa med par 'gyur ro // / +so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na  spyod pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa ni med de / /

column3: chos mngon pa pa nyi 'og pa rnams kyi ltar na 'thob pa drug ste / / +bzhi po de dag dang  sdom pa 'thob pa    dang  rnam par 'jig pa 'thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#70360#70372#TD4095E.TXT.r_1440;TD4095E.TXT.r_1441;TD4095E.TXT.r_1442;TD4095E.TXT.r_1443;TD4095E.TXT.r_1444;TD4095E.TXT.r_1445# so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'ang yin la / / +zag pa med pa'ang yin te / / +lam gyi dbang gis so // /
column5: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464472#1464472#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7542# de'i ngo bo nyid kho na'i rgyu yin la dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po'i lam kho na'i yin gyi dman pa'i phyir dbang po rtul po'i lam gyi ni ma yin no // /
column6: 0.027#TD4097E.TXT.r#2222992#2222992#TD4097E.TXT.r_2691# zag pa med pa'i lam gyi thob pa dang lam gyi bden pa'i zag pa med pa'o // /

column3: snga ma ni dbang po rnams kyi yin la / / +phyi ma ni lus kyi yin te / / +dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang  shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang  de bzhin du lus 'di la skra yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no // /

column7: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034119#1034119#TD4054E.TXT.r_7025;TD4054E.TXT.r_7026# rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa gang yin pas de ni  sbyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bsam pa'o // / +gang dag la de ltar sbyin pas phan 'dogs pa'i sems can de dag ni bdag la shin tu phan 'dogs par byang chub sems dpa' mthong gi bdag gis ni ma yin te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#71590#71600#TD4095E.TXT.r_1719;TD4095E.TXT.r_1720# gang dag la rten mtshungs pa tha mi dad par yod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni phan tshun mtshungs par    ldan pa'i rgyu yin no // /

column6: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1616314#1616319#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3675# chos kyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang  de dag phan tshun dang   sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams nyid dang  de dag phan tshun dang  rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thogs pa dang bcas pa phan tshun dang  thogs pa med pa cung zad dang  thams cad 'byung ba dag dang lta bu'o // /

column5: 0.017#TD4091E.TXT.r#705766#705766#TD4091E.TXT.r_2097# rang gi sa pa'i kun du 'gro ba sngar byung ba rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i chos phyi ma rnams kyi kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu ste / /

column3: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / +rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag las shes te / / +'dir dpe ni zhing  ba lta bu'o zhes zer ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#71621#71632#TD4095E.TXT.r_1722;TD4095E.TXT.r_1723;TD4095E.TXT.r_1724;TD4095E.TXT.r_1725# kun du 'gro ba'i chos sngar skyes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i chos phyi ma rnams kyi kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yin no // / +de dag kyang 'og tu bshad par bya'o // / +'di ni nyon mongs ba can gyi chos kyi  thun mong gi rgyu yin pas na / /

column3: smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste / / +'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#71633#71648#TD4095E.TXT.r_1724;TD4095E.TXT.r_1725;TD4095E.TXT.r_1726;TD4095E.TXT.r_1727;TD4095E.TXT.r_1728# 'di ni nyon mongs ba can gyi chos kyi  thun mong gi rgyu yin pas na / / +skal ba ma nyam pa'i rgyu logs shig tu rnam par gzhag ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#843721#843724#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12699;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12700;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12701# lhan cig 'byung ba dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyus bsdus pa'i rgyu mi dge ba la    dgongs nas de skad du gsungs pas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba med do // / +kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu bshad zin to // / +rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o // /

column5: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235248#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /

column7: 0.017#TD4042E.TXT.r#1681948#1681948#TD4042E.TXT.r_648# shes rab 'phel bar mi byed pa dang  nyes pa sngar ma spangs pa gang yin PA DE NI YANG DAG pa'i sgrub pas  bsdus pa'i rnam par grol ba yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#823564#823564#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9506# slob pa dang mi slob pa'i bye brag dang  gang zag gi bye brag dang  gnyen po'i bye brag gis  'phags pa'i chos rnams mang ba'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi ma rnyed pa'o zhes khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos gang dag gi zhes dris dang  de'i phyir / /
column9: 0.017#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655828#2655828#TD4017E.TXT.r_407# slob pa'i sa rnams rdzogs pas 'gog pa'i bden pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335581#1335581#TD4037E.TXT.r_2729;TD4037E.TXT.r_2731;TD4037E.TXT.r_2732;TD4037E.TXT.r_2733;TD4037E.TXT.r_2734# bsdigs pa'am / / +gsad pa'am / / +bcing ba'am / / +chad pas gcad pa'am / / +go rar gzhug pa'am / /
column11: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977608#977609#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11187;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11188# cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na lta ci smos zhes cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa skye zhing dge ba la yang 'jug par  'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +ma nges par dbye ba'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas su lung bstan par bshad pa dang  theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column12: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024698#1024698#TD4054E.TXT.r_5582;TD4054E.TXT.r_5583# de dag ni sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bsam gtan gyi sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsgribs pa'i lung du ma bstan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de la  sred pas ni ro myang ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs so // /
column13: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#748778#748779#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /
column14: 0.018#TD4018E.TXT.r#3064452#3064452#TD4018E.TXT.r_7845# bsam  pa med cing snang ba med pa don dam pa'i bden pa mi gnyis par yang dag par rig pa ni mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pas na der yod pa dang  med pa dang  rtag pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bdag dang  bdag med pa dang  mdzes pa dang  mi    mdzes pa la sogs par tha dad par snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040238#1040238#TD4054E.TXT.r_7862# gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi gar rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332812#1332812#TD4037E.TXT.r_2327# sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2625944#2625945#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11139;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11140# de med pa'i phyir ro // / +sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang  bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang  mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa de lta bu ni 'thob po // /
column18: 0.019#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column19: 0.019#TD4009E.TXT.r#341150#341150#TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780# 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column20: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column21: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column22: 0.019#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /

column22: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103901#3103901#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1775# 'bras BU LA CHAGS PA MED PA'I bsam pa dang  sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i bsam pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o // /
column23: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1206726#1206726#TD4047E.TXT.r_12164;TD4047E.TXT.r_12165# skyon dang bcas pa'i mnyes gshin pa'i gnyen POR NI RIGS PA DANG mi skyo ba'o // / +'dun pa'i mnyes gshin pa'i gnyen por ni gsol ba ma btab pa dang zang zing med pa'o // /
column24: 0.015#TD4026E.TXT.r#276694#276694#TD4026E.TXT.r_315# sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don mi shes par yang khong khro bar rigs pa ma yin pas khong khro bar mi rung bar tshigs su bcad pa / /
column25: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1138989#1138990#TD4047E.TXT.r_2549;TD4047E.TXT.r_2550# 'byung ba'i dngos po dang  'byung ba las gyur pa'i dngos po dang  gnyis ka'i dngos po'o // / +lus kyi yo byad rnam pa bcu'i dbang du byas pa dang yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po'i dbang du byas pa'o // /
column26: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2152110#2152110#TD4029E.TXT.r_4134;TD4029E.TXT.r_4135;TD4029E.TXT.r_4136# zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnam par chad pa'i ni ring ba'o // / +de ma thag pa'i ni nye ba'o // / +dus gzhan na sbyar bar bya ba'i ni ring ba'o // /
column27: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#157467#157467#TD4035E.TXT.r_5630;TD4035E.TXT.r_5631;TD4035E.TXT.r_5632;TD4035E.TXT.r_5633# log par yid la byed pa'am / / +bag med pa'am / / +yid gnyis za ba'am / / +skur pa 'debs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column28: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#157480#157480#TD4035E.TXT.r_5635;TD4035E.TXT.r_5636;TD4035E.TXT.r_5637;TD4035E.TXT.r_5638;TD4035E.TXT.r_5639# sdug  bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la mi byed pa'am / / +log par yid la byed pa'am / / +bag med pa'am / / +yid gnyis za ba'am / / +skur pa 'debs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column29: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1463898#1463906#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7456;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7457;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7458# rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column30: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358223#2358229#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5523;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5524;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5525# ye shes gnyis kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni lhun gyis grub bar bsgoms pas thob pa'o // / +nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni 'bar bar bsgoms pas thob pa'o // /
column31: 0.017#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965311#2965312#TD4053E.TXT.r_84;TD4053E.TXT.r_85# rjes su 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid ni  'byung ba gyur na de la gnas pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column32: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464366#1464366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7531;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7532# sa gong ma pa dang sa 'og ma pa dag phan tshun du zhes de skad du bya ba'i phyir te / / +sa gong ma pa yang sa 'og ma pa dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin la / /
column33: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#157509#157509#TD4035E.TXT.r_5645;TD4035E.TXT.r_5646# mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang  dbang phyug dang  rang bzhin dang  skyes bu gzhan la sogs par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // / +rgyu  ji lta bar rgyu las byung ba'i 'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te / /
column34: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1159802#1159803#TD4047E.TXT.r_5699;TD4047E.TXT.r_5700# ji skad bstan pa'i chos de dag nyid ces BYA BA LA SOGS PA'O // / +rnam par byang ba'i yang rgyu bcu po nyid ji ltar rigs par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu dang  skye ba'i rgyu dang  'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir smras pa / /
column35: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#705957#705958#TD4091E.TXT.r_2128;TD4091E.TXT.r_2129;TD4091E.TXT.r_2130# yang 'bras bu 'di rnams las rgyu gang gi 'bras bu gang zhig ce na / / +rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin // / +rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni tha mar 'don pa'i phyir tha ma ste / /
column36: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2004303#2004304#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3823;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3824# ma 'ongs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod PAR BYA STE / / +'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o // /
column37: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#847798#847798#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13352;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13353# bsnams nas blta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PAR ro // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column38: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1003825#1003826#TD4054E.TXT.r_2128;TD4054E.TXT.r_2129# ngan 'gro 'am bde 'gror 'bras bu mi 'dod pas 'phen pa'am / / +yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'dzin pa'o // /
column39: 0.020#TD4088E.TXT.r#2837615#2837615#TD4088E.TXT.r_2590;TD4088E.TXT.r_2591# rnam par smin pa yang zad pas kyang zad par mi 'gyur ba'o // / +zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu yod dam zhe na / /
column40: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#126177#126177#TD4035E.TXT.r_237;TD4035E.TXT.r_238# yang 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus rnam par rig par byed pa'o // / +yang skad cig pas rgyu rnam par rig par byed pa'o // /
column41: 0.020#TD4017E.TXT.r#2651722#2651723#TD4017E.TXT.r_30;TD4017E.TXT.r_31# nga sngon 'das pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di 'dod pa'i phyir bskal pa mang por skyo mi shes pas tshol zhing sngon rgyal  po mdzad pa'i tshe phyogs bzhir dung bus rnga brdungs te chos tshol ba na drang srong las chos mnyan pa'i phyir rim gro bkur sti grangs med par byed pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las chos thos par tshol ba'i rgyu dang gleng gzhir ston pa'o // /
column42: 0.021#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1471935#1471937#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8419;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8420;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8421# re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs na zhes bya ba ni 'di gnyis ni / / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column43: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1019292#1019292#TD4054E.TXT.r_4735# de dag gis ni gcig tu nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas ma rig pa yod par gyur na 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la mngon par yid ches pa'i rnam pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'i skabs med pa'i phyir ro // /
column44: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#85751#85751#TD4095E.TXT.r_4422;TD4095E.TXT.r_4423# re zhig  mi dge ba thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni dmyal bar skye ba'o // / +mi rnams su srog gcod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni tshe thung ba'o // /
column45: 0.023#TD4010E.TXT.r#2282450#2282450#TD4010E.TXT.r_6666;TD4010E.TXT.r_6667;TD4010E.TXT.r_6668# las dkar nag gi 'bras bu bdag nyid kyis byas pa rnams rgyud gcig tu mngon par zhen pas nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas     // / +'bras bu rgyu med pa yang ma yin te / / +las dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column46: 0.023#TD4043E.TXT.r#357010#357010#TD4043E.TXT.r_231;TD4043E.TXT.r_232;TD4043E.TXT.r_233# de la rgyu'i dngos po la skyed pa'i rgyu ni / / +sa bon thams cad pa zhes gang smos pa'o // / +gnas pa'i rgyu nyid ni / /
column47: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1159053#1159056#TD4047E.TXT.r_5589;TD4047E.TXT.r_5590# zhing dang chu la sogs pa'i rkyen ni 'bras bu'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin te / / +thams cad kyis 'bras bu de yongs su 'dzin par byed pas zhes byas nas so // /
column48: 0.023#TD4039E.TXT.r#1837362#1837362#TD4039E.TXT.r_2761;TD4039E.TXT.r_2762# las byed pa dang  de'i 'bras bu la longs spyod pa'i skyes bu'am / / +'jug pa dang ldog pa'i skyes bur rnam par brtags pa'i rjes  su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir ni bdag tu smra ba nye bar len to // /
column49: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1465895#1465896#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7700# de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu  las yongs su nyams pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i lam sngar skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyis skyes pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te / /
column50: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1470733#1470733#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8252;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8253# de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnams nas lta bar 'dod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa sbyar bar bya ba yin no // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column51: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#852120#852120#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14024# rnam par smin pa'i rgyu la ni mjug thogs su rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pas de ji ltar skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed par rung zhe na / /
column52: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#841316#841316#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12329;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12330# skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang / / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column53: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2152061#2152061#TD4029E.TXT.r_4124;TD4029E.TXT.r_4125;TD4029E.TXT.r_4126# da ltar byung ba ni 'bras bu yin no // / +de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu yin te / / +'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa'o // /
column54: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#840980#840980#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12269;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12270# thun mong ba nyid du bgrang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir byed rgyu'i rgyu yang ma yin te / / +lhag mar gyur pas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu kho na mngon par bzhed pas 'dir lhan cig 'byung ba dang  mtshungs par ldan pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rgyu la  dgongs pa ma yin no // /
column55: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#811175#811175#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7422;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7423# 'on kyang de dbang po rtul po yin kyang mthar gyis par gyur pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob cing / / +de las yongs su nyams par gyur pas mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te / /
column56: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2705839#2705839#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_539;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_540# bzo shes pa dang bzo'i las de dang de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no // / +de la rgyu'i rkyen gang yin    pa de ni skyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin no // /
column57: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1952537#1952537#TD4032E.TXT.r_5071;TD4032E.TXT.r_5072;TD4032E.TXT.r_5073# rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni phyi ma phyi ma 'bras bu'i bshad pa'o // / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'bras bu ni / / +thog ma'i 'bras bu'i bshad pa'o // /
column58: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#323496#323496#TD4009E.TXT.r_502;TD4009E.TXT.r_503# gzhan gyi stobs dang sbyor ba'i stobs kyis sems de skye ba ni mi brtan par skye bar rig par bya'o // / +de'i log pa'i rgyu yang rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste / /
column59: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1003154#1003154#TD4054E.TXT.r_1997# rgyu yod kyang ma byung ba dang  rang gi mtshan nyid ma thob pa dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu ma spyad pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po nye bar dmigs pa dang  rgyu dang  rang  gi mtshan nyid yod pa dang med pa dang  mngon par dga' bas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma dang  mngon par dga' ba med pas rnam par byang ba'i mtshan mas kyang ma 'ongs par blta bar bya'o // /
column60: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2967154#2967155#TD4053E.TXT.r_358;TD4053E.TXT.r_359# rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad pa zhes bya ba la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni legs par spyod pa'o // / +mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni nyes par spyod pa'o zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PA ste / /
column61: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2022963#2022964#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6540# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par LTA BA LA SOGS PA dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa'i bde ba'i dbang po'i zag pa med pa'i chos shes pa'i phyogs dang MTHUN PA YIN NO // /
column62: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#845664#845664#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13027# skyed par    byed pa dang  'gal bar mi byed pa'o zhes 'di ni byed rgyu'i rgyu bsam par bshad zin to zhes zer ro // /
column63: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2459346#2459346#TD4019E.TXT.r_6865# dmigs pa'i rkyen ni rang snang ba'i yan lag dang  skyed bar byed pa'i yan lag gnyis  dang ldan pa shes pa'i rnam par 'jog par byed pa'o 'dir mtshan nyid ni shes pa'i rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes byed pas nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid du sbyar kyang 'gal ba med de / /
column64: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1187298#1187299#TD4047E.TXT.r_9459# ngag rnam par dag pa rnam pa bzhi la brten nas zhes bya bas ni 'phags pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bstan to // /
column65: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1053586#1053586#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_237;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_238# dper na btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i khyad par la ltos pa'i me de nyid zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang  yin zhing / / +de nyid mi zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin la btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i gnas skabs gang dang phrad nas zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yin pa de dang phrad nas rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin pa bzhin te 'di ni dpe yin no // /
column66: 0.028#TD4001E.TXT.r#1972659#1972659#TD4001E.TXT.r_15;TD4001E.TXT.r_16;TD4001E.TXT.r_17# de la gleng gzhi ni mdo sde 'byung ba'i rgyu ste / / +de yang yang dag par sdud par byed pas / / +bdag la yid ches par  bya ba'i phyir / /
column67: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1619387#1619388#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4138;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4139# thos nas  lta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column68: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1619335#1619335#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4129;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4130;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4131# rnam par smin    pa'i 'bras bu ni de yin no // / +bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin // / +byed rgyu'i rgyu ni dang par bstan pa'i phyir dang po ste bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i yin no // /

column3: de yi dmigs pa ngag dang  lam // / +de'i dmigs pa ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no // / +shes pa dgu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1471933#1471937#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8419;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8420;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8421# re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs na zhes bya ba ni 'di gnyis ni / / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column5: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#71753#71765#TD4095E.TXT.r_1750;TD4095E.TXT.r_1751;TD4095E.TXT.r_1752;TD4095E.TXT.r_1753;TD4095E.TXT.r_1754# bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin // / +byed rgyu'i ni bdag po'i 'bras bu'o // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column6: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#847798#847798#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13352;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13353# bsnams nas blta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs par ro // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column7: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1463898#1463900#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7456;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7457# rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column8: 0.021#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1470733#1470733#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8252;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8253# de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnams nas lta bar 'dod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa sbyar bar bya BA YIN NO // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column9: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#841316#841316#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12329;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12330# skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang / / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column10: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1619387#1619388#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4138;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4139# thos nas  lta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o // / +rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // /
column11: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#705973#705974#TD4091E.TXT.r_2133;TD4091E.TXT.r_2134# rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro yin // /

column3: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te / / +'gog ba shes pa ma gtogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1619399#1619404#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4140;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4141;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4142# 'di gnyis dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no // / +skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin // / +skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig  'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1463709#1463711#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7439;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7440# 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras BU YIN TE / / +de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#71762#71773#TD4095E.TXT.r_1752;TD4095E.TXT.r_1753;TD4095E.TXT.r_1754;TD4095E.TXT.r_1755;TD4095E.TXT.r_1756# rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // / +'di gnyis dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no // /
column7: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#705980#705986#TD4091E.TXT.r_2134;TD4091E.TXT.r_2135;TD4091E.TXT.r_2136# 'di gnyis dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin // /
column8: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1470956#1470956#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8280;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8281;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8282# skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi ni de ma thag tu 'byung ba kho na skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin no // / +byed rgyu'i rgyu ni gnyi ga yin no // / +yang ci skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu las gzhan pa zhig yin nam  zhe na / /

column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#72272#72287#TD4095E.TXT.r_1848;TD4095E.TXT.r_1849# dbang phyug la sogs pa gcig kho na rgyu yin na 'gro ba thams cad cig car 'byung bar  'gyur ba zhig na dngos po rnams rim gyis 'byung bar yang snang ngo // /

column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1621508#1621512#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4465;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4466# gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye // / +zhes gang bshad pa de ji ltar na 'byung ba rnams 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen yin zhe na / /

column13: 0.021#TD4046E.TXT.r#2204480#2204480#TD4046E.TXT.r_1146# 'di lta ste gzhi bsdu ba las 'byung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni rgyu rnam pa lnga ste chung ngu dang chen po la sogs pa sngar bstan pa bzhin no // /

column18: 0.023#TD4049E.TXT.r#2307105#2307106#TD4049E.TXT.r_3354# yang shes bya la log par rtogs pa'i rgyun yin pa dang  lta ba la log par rtogs pa'i  rgyu yin pa dang  gnyen po la log par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column7: 0.011#TD4018E.TXT.r#3078272#3078272#TD4018E.TXT.r_9684;TD4018E.TXT.r_9685# nges pa'i tshig gi rnam par rtog pas na bya ba'i phyir na 'bras bu'o // / +byed pa'i  phyir na rgyu ste / /
column8: 0.013#TD4017E.TXT.r#2659313#2659313#TD4017E.TXT.r_798# yang bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa ni 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i ched pas nyan pa rnams spro zhing thos par dka' ba'i sems skye ba'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyu zhes bya bas de'i phyir 'od kyis rgyang ring po tshun chad snang bar mdzad do // /
column9: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096158#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_611# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column10: 0.013#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965311#2965312#TD4053E.TXT.r_84;TD4053E.TXT.r_85# rjes su 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid ni  'byung ba gyur na de la gnas pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2551001#2551001#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro // / +gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gya gyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir te / /
column12: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2624265#2624265#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10925# rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column13: 0.013#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464366#1464366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7531;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7532# sa gong ma pa dang sa 'og ma pa dag phan tshun du zhes de skad du bya ba'i phyir te / / +sa gong ma pa yang sa 'og ma pa dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin la / /
column14: 0.013#TD4052E.TXT.r#2863024#2863025#TD4052E.TXT.r_2469;TD4052E.TXT.r_2470# kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i phyogs la ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sems kyi sa bon 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas chos nyid kyis gnas pa'am bskyed pa'ang rung rnam  par bar ma chad par brgyad de 'ongs pa rnam par smin par gyur pa gzugs na spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir / /
column15: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157015#1157015#TD4047E.TXT.r_5279# rnam pa gnyis kyis drag bcom pa nyid rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang  de'i rgyu rab tu bstan par bya ba'i  phyir smras pa / /
column16: 0.014#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column17: 0.014#TD4009E.TXT.r#341150#341153#TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781# 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column18: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235249#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column19: 0.014#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column20: 0.014#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155767#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096;TD4047E.TXT.r_5097# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /
column22: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column23: 0.014#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column24: 0.014#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632114#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.014#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862231#862232#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column28: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#853508#853513#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14240;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14241;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14242# de'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid do // / +rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir rten pa'i rgyu nyid do // /
column29: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#840976#840979#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12269;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12270# thun mong ba nyid du bgrang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir byed rgyu'i rgyu yang ma yin te / /
column30: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035521#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column31: 0.017#TD4019E.TXT.r#2508626#2508626#TD4019E.TXT.r_13386# kun gzhi dang nyon mongs pa can ni rgyu cha phra bas byis pa'i skye bo'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir / /
column32: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2718193#2718193#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2135;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2136# mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro // / +skyes pa gnas pa'i rgyu de las  gzhan pa yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir 'du byed thams cad ni rang gi ngang gis 'jig pa yin par rig par bya ste / /
column33: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794925#794926#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4714;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4715# pa des na rgyun dngos por mtshungs pa'i phyir te / / +'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column34: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794553#794553#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4652;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4653# rang gi dbang po'i byed pa smos pas ni / / +skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa'i byed pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column35: 0.019#TD4067E.TXT.r#1088162#1088162#TD4067E.TXT.r_222# 'dra bar 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyis rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul ni 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column36: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121767#3121767#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4277;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4278;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4279;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4280# de ni ltos pa'i RIGS PA YIN NO // / +chos rnams  'thob pa'am / / +'grub pa'am / / +skyes pa rnams las byed pas 'gyur pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang  rkyen gang dag yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i RIGS PA YIN NO // /
column37: 0.020#TD4067E.TXT.r#1088151#1088152#TD4067E.TXT.r_220;TD4067E.TXT.r_221# rten gyi rgyu ni rjes su 'jug  pa'i rgyu nyid de 'byung bdag gyur na de la brten pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +rton pa'i rgyu ni gnas pa'i rgyu ste / /
column38: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2235203#2235203#TD4010E.TXT.r_630# rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar mi 'gyur bas bsngags pa la ma chags pa  zhes bya'o // /
column39: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1135872#1135872#TD4047E.TXT.r_2122;TD4047E.TXT.r_2123# da ni btung ba byin pas stobs dang ldan zhes bya  ba'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas rgyu gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +brtas par 'gyur ba ni stobs skyed par byed pa'o // /
column40: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#993042#993043#TD4054E.TXT.r_225;TD4054E.TXT.r_226# rjes su 'gyur pa'i rgyu nyid ni 'byung ba rnams gyur na de la gnas pa nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs rnams mi gnas par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i  rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyis nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column41: 0.020#TD4009E.TXT.r#330299#330300#TD4009E.TXT.r_1399# mi rtag par 'dzin pa ni bdag med par 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir mi rtag par 'dzin pa bkag pas bdag med par 'dzin pa yang bkag par rig par bya'o // /
column42: 0.020#TD4091E.TXT.r#706848#706849#TD4091E.TXT.r_2295;TD4091E.TXT.r_2296;TD4091E.TXT.r_2297# ri mo'i rtsig pa bzhin no // / +ston pa'i rgyu ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column43: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1408481#1408482#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_957;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_958;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_959# gnas pa'i rgyu ni gzhi'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir te ri mo'i rtsig pa lta bu'o // / +rton pa'i rgyu ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column44: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1476578#1476578#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8912;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8913# gnas pa'i rgyu nyid ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +'phel ba'i rgyu nyid ni 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column45: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198931#1198931#TD4047E.TXT.r_11033# dbang phyug spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o / /
column46: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#310825#310825#TD4026E.TXT.r_6560;TD4026E.TXT.r_6561# de'i rgyu nyid dang 'bras bu'i phyir zhes bya bas te / / +skad cig ma'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir  dang ; /
column47: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#842938#842938#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12587;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12588# yang mtshungs par ldan pa dang  lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ces  khong na yod pa'i dri ba gtan la dbab par bya ba'i phyir / / +mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yang yin no zhes bya ba smos so // /
column48: 0.023#TD4018E.TXT.r#3075297#3075298#TD4018E.TXT.r_9256# rgyu zhig par rgyu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir chad par lta bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni rgyu 'jig pa'i phyir skad cig pa'i gnyis po la 'bras  bu'i dngos po med pas skad cig pa snga ma RGYU MA YIN NO // /
column49: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2589100#2589101#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6625;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6626# khyad par 'bras kyi tshogs shas kyis tshos pa la ni zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin zhing / / +de nyid de tshig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir mi zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin la / /
column50: 0.023#TD4049E.TXT.r#2307105#2307106#TD4049E.TXT.r_3354# yang shes bya la log par rtogs pa'i rgyun yin pa dang  lta ba la log par rtogs pa'i  rgyu yin pa dang  gnyen po la log par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column51: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1429262#1429262#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3362# gnas nyams pas nyams pa'i phyir dang bde ba chung ngu'i rgyu nyid  kyis nyams pa'i phyir ro // /
column52: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1483204#1483204#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9706;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9707# 'di gnyis so sor gsungs pa ni khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +'gro ba'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyu ni las kyi srid pa yin no zhes bya  bar ro // /
column53: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#859862#859862#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15187;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15188# nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du khyad par med kyang nyon mongs pa dag las lta ba'i snyigs ma dag tha dad du gzhag pa  ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +'gro ba'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la / /
column54: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#880913#880913#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18355;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18356# rgyu de skye ba dang mthun par gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column55: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#850003#850003#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13711;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13712# lhan cig 'byung ba dang byed rgyu'i rgyu dag phan tshun mi 'khrul pa'i phyir la / / +rgyu lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu la mi ltos pa'i phyir dus thams cad du skye bar thal  ba'i phyir ro // /
column56: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254388#1254389#TD4051E.TXT.r_3174;TD4051E.TXT.r_3175# gnas dang yo byad dang mi ldan pa yang spyod lam bzhi po dag gis tshul khrims la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyun ring po nyid ni dus ring por rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro // /
column57: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166257#1166257#TD4047E.TXT.r_6613# gnod pa byas  nas gtong bar yang mi byed do zhes bya ba ni de dag la gzhan ster ba med pa'i phyir dang  bsrung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang  mi snyan par brjod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir yang sbyin par mi byed do // /
column58: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2916391#2916391#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6835;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6836# don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / / +'di ltar de dang phrad pa'i phyir sngon po'i rgyu mi 'dra bar snang ste zhes bya ba smos te / /
column59: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1463903#1463903#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7456;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7457# rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i // / +zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang  rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o // /
column60: 0.025#TD4095E.TXT.r#74239#74239#TD4095E.TXT.r_2250;TD4095E.TXT.r_2251# me long gi rgyud  dang 'brel pa'i phyir dang  lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +rgyun la rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar brjod pa'i phyir dpe mi 'dra ba yin no // /
column61: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2001721#2001721#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3413# de yang rgyun chags su nges par rtogs pas rgyun  gcad par dka' ba'i phyir bstan pa'o // /
column62: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2484079#2484081#TD4019E.TXT.r_9995;TD4019E.TXT.r_9996# de bzhin  du shes bya'i gnas thug pa med pa mkhyen pa dang  'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin lhun gyis grub par dbang byed pa'o // / +rgyu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyun kyang ldog pas chad par lta ba dang  de 'dra ba'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid skye ba la sogs  pas mi mthong ba ni chos zhes bya'o // /

column3: de bzhin du gzhan  gyi yang dran no // / +mngon par grub nas ni thod rgal du yang dran no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#72341#72352#TD4095E.TXT.r_1860;TD4095E.TXT.r_1861;TD4095E.TXT.r_1862;TD4095E.TXT.r_1863;TD4095E.TXT.r_1864;TD4095E.TXT.r_1865;TD4095E.TXT.r_1866# gnas pa'i rgyu yin te / / +rten du gyur pa'i phyir  ro ; / / +rton pa'i rgyun yin te / / +rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#853509#853509#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14240;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14241# de'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid do // / +rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir rten pa'i rgyu nyid do // /

column3: sngon nyams su myong ba kho na dran no // / +gnas gtsang ma rnams ji ltar dran zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4089E.TXT.r#563042#563044#TD4089E.TXT.r_463;TD4089E.TXT.r_464# 'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga // / +'byung  gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du // /
column5: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#72353#72360#TD4095E.TXT.r_1865;TD4095E.TXT.r_1866;TD4095E.TXT.r_1867;TD4095E.TXT.r_1868# de ni byed rgyu kho na rnam pa lnga ru phye ba'o // / +'byung gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du // /

column3: thos pas nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro // / +gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa na pha rol pa'i rgyud la brten nas skyed  de ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1621620#1621624#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4488# de la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa phan tshun du yin gyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gzhan ma yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#72361#72373#TD4095E.TXT.r_1866;TD4095E.TXT.r_1867;TD4095E.TXT.r_1868;TD4095E.TXT.r_1869;TD4095E.TXT.r_1870# 'byung gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du // / +lhan cig 'byung ba dang  skal ba mnyam pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag gis  so ; / / +de la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa phan tshun du yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no // /

column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623212#1623217#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4762;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4763;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4764;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4765;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4766# lhag ma ni rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o // / +bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / / +skye    dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / /

column3: lha yi mig dang rna ba yin // / +'di ltar de  gnyis ni / / +bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba / / +bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mig dang rna ba'i thod kor du sgra dang  snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang  sgra dag mthong ba dang  thos pa'i rgyu mngon par  'grub pas bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang  rna ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no // /

column6: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#73478#73486#TD4095E.TXT.r_2089;TD4095E.TXT.r_2090;TD4095E.TXT.r_2091;TD4095E.TXT.r_2092;TD4095E.TXT.r_2093;TD4095E.TXT.r_2094# khams gsum gyi dbye bas sems la sogs pa  rnams kyi dbye ba bshad nas / / +de nyid ma bshad pas de brjod par bya ste / / +dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang / /
column7: 0.020#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623261#1623262#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4771;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4772;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4773;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4774# 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams de dag gang yin pa brjod par bya ste / / +de'i phyir / / +dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang / /

column11: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#707617#707617#TD4091E.TXT.r_2430;TD4091E.TXT.r_2431# chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa las / / +dbang po bstan pa  zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o //// /
column12: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1480845#1480845#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9401# chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon rgyal po'i sras  grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o //// /

column3: de gnyis kyang rtag tu brten bcas ma tshang med / / +thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2158460#2158462#TD4029E.TXT.r_4969;TD4029E.TXT.r_4970# 'od mi gsal ba nyid du ni de las gzhan du skye ba rnams kyi gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni dga' ldan dang  'thab bral dang sum cu rtsa gsum  pa dang ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136396#136398#TD4035E.TXT.r_2012# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093679#3093682#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column7: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296272#2296275#TD4049E.TXT.r_1608# sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams dang   shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  'dzam bu gling dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang   tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can  dang ; /
column8: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011563#1011566#TD4054E.TXT.r_3452# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang  ri'i  rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba gang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang    byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni / /
column9: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1801479#1801482#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12747# ji srid du nyi mas mun pa 'phrog cing phyogs snang bar byed pa de srid du  stong gi 'jig rten zhes bya ste nyi ma stong dang zla ba stong dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha stong dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong rnams dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong rnams te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1894088#1894092#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1275# sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin rnams las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang  rgyal chen ris bzhi dang  sum cu  rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#73487#73500#TD4095E.TXT.r_2092;TD4095E.TXT.r_2094;TD4095E.TXT.r_2093;TD4095E.TXT.r_2095# mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag / / +'gro ba bzhi dang  lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste / /

column13: 0.008#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011392#1011395#TD4054E.TXT.r_3446# rnams dang  sum chu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang  tshangs ris dang  tshangs ba mdun na 'dong dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad  med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong ba dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min rnams su'o // /
column14: 0.010#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094136#1094137#TD4067E.TXT.r_1290# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i lha drug la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral rnams dang  dga' ldan rnams dang  'phrul dga' rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams te / /
column15: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281777#1281780#TD4086E.TXT.r_288# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa dang  skom pa yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang  nub kyi ba  lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column16: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281866#1281870#TD4086E.TXT.r_298# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji  lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column18: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282166#1282170#TD4086E.TXT.r_342# rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi 'jig rten  pa bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column19: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282267#1282270#TD4086E.TXT.r_350# shing las byung ba'i gos gyon pa bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column20: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282419#1282422#TD4086E.TXT.r_369# rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column21: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282889#1282890#TD4086E.TXT.r_443# rgyal chen bzhi pa lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du sum  cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang  tshangs ris pa rnams dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams  dang  tshad med 'od ba rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams  dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column22: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282998#1283001#TD4086E.TXT.r_452# rgyal  chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column23: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283162#1283165#TD4086E.TXT.r_471# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang  nyin mo yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra  mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column24: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283220#1283223#TD4086E.TXT.r_475# ji lta ba  'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba  rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /

column8: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#715856#715859#TD4091E.TXT.r_3892;TD4091E.TXT.r_3893# lha drug po de dag  gi tshe ji tsam bshad pa de dang ni rim bzhin yang sos dang  thig nag dang  bsdus 'joms dang  ngu 'bod dang  ngu 'bod chen po dang  tsha ba ste / /
column9: 0.013#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639987#1639990#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7410# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji tsam  par bshad pa de dang go rims bzhin du yang sos dang  thig nag dang  bsdus 'joms dang  ngu 'bod dang  ngu 'bod chen po dang  tsha ba dang  dmyal ba drug gi nyin zhag dang mnyam par rig par bya ste / /

column7: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296292#2296292#TD4049E.TXT.r_1608# sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams dang   shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  'dzam bu gling dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang   tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can  dang ; /
column8: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011415#1011415#TD4054E.TXT.r_3446# rnams dang  sum chu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang  tshangs ris dang  tshangs ba mdun na 'dong dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad  med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong ba dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min rnams su'o // /

column3: bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum pa mthong ngo // / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gzigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57216#57220#TD4036E.TXT.r_8518# 'di lta ste gnas gtsang ma lnga po mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  shin tu mthong dang  gya nom snang dang  'og min gyi lha rnams dang ci rigs par skal ba mnyam par skye'o // /

column6: 0.024#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296301#2296301#TD4049E.TXT.r_1609# mi che ba dang  mi gsung ba dang  gya nom snang dang  shin tu mthong dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rnams su  sems can skye ba'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392637#2392639#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9693# bstan bcos rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920058#920063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3765;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# bzang po'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas gnas te rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /
column9: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920172#920173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3785# thams cad skye mched bcu ni sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar  po ste kha dog bzhi dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis kyis bsnan te bcu'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901490#2901494#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4719# gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam  shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang gsum gyi sems can gyi rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po la rten to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#134594#134594#TD4035E.TXT.r_1673# 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang  bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang ldan pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa dang  zag pa med par bsdus pa'o // /

column14: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24155#24164#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column15: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24787#24796#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774;TD4036E.TXT.r_3775# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column16: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324079#1324080#TD4037E.TXT.r_1181# chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'jig rten 'di dang  'jig rten pha rol dang  nyi ma dang  zla ba 'di gnyis dang  mthong ba dang   thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bcal ba dang  yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang  rjes su dpyad pa de dag thams cad la brten cing bsam gtan mi byed do // /
column17: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702190#2702191#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /
column18: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2727091#2727092#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3726# bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang  de bzhin du rgyas par zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang  de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i skye mched bzhi dang   de bzhin du skye mched gnyis po 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  de dag la sogs pa skye mched kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gis mtshan nyid ji skad smos pas ci rigs par bsdu bar rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760271#2760274#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // /
column20: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093707#3093713#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /

column3: 'on te    thams cad las zhes bya ba dang  gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa 'di ci rnam par shes pa thams cad ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gsungs sam / /

column3: 'on te ming dang gzugs thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du gsungs zhes bya ba dang  gang  yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag par gsungs pa 'di ci de dag thams cad med na de bkag gam / /

column5: 0.018#TD4032E.TXT.r#1960043#1960044#TD4032E.TXT.r_6281;TD4032E.TXT.r_6282# chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du yang srid pa'i rgyun ni ngo bo nyid med par shes pas ngo bo nyid med par mi byed pa'i bar du ste / /
